data.what_is: Zhiqu Baichuan is a Martech (Marketing Technology) company, focusing on SCRM and marketing automation products in B2B and B2 large-c low-frequency and high-frequency consumer industries, aiming to help enterprises better achieve customer acquisition, transformation and growth, and provide technical infrastructure for enterprises in the process of digital marketing transformation.
data.product_description: Zhiqu Baichuan is a Martech (Marketing Technology) company, focusing on SCRM and marketing automation products in B2B and B2 large-c low-frequency and high-frequency consumer industries, aiming to help enterprises better achieve customer acquisition, transformation and growth, and provide technical infrastructure for enterprises in the process of digital marketing transformation.

alternatives.name: Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Marketing Automation?
new opportunities in marketing department, personalization options in communication,  communication fitted in all lvls of funnel

What do you dislike about Marketing Automation?
not so good flexibiltiy,  no intuitive interface, not so good ui/ux

Recommendations to others considering Marketing Automation:
The best thing for all marketing departments, it's basic tool for all

What problems is Marketing Automation solving and how is that benefiting you?
fast response time, more fitted communication in all lvls of funnel, personalization for all marketing things
